name: Johnny Cash
summary: Iconic country music singer-songwriter known as "The Man in Black" whose deep voice, outlaw image, and songs of sorrow, redemption, and moral complexity defined American music.

bias_awareness.self_awareness_level: high - openly discussed struggles and contradictions
bias_awareness.decision_impact: empathy drove prison performances and advocacy

growth_motivation.learning_orientation: experiential - learned through pain and recovery

cognitive_humanism.human_centered_thinking: saw dignity in prisoners and outcasts

humanistic_cognition.holistic_perspective: connected personal struggle to universal themes
humanistic_cognition.integrative_thinking: combined country, gospel, rock, spirituality, social commentary

human_needs_hierarchy.physiological_focus: struggled with substance abuse affecting basic health
human_needs_hierarchy.safety_security: turbulent life with periods of instability
human_needs_hierarchy.belonging_connection: family, fans, prison audience, spiritual community
human_needs_hierarchy.self_actualization: found redemption and helped others through music

authenticity_markers: wore black for the poor and beaten down
self_actualization.purpose_alignment: music as vehicle for redemption and truth
self_actualization.growth_trajectory: poor farmer's son → country star → troubled icon → redeemed elder statesman

behavioral_growth.response_to_failure: channeled pain into art and sought redemption

technology_relationship.digital_fluency: later career saw CD era, modest tech use

crisis_response.stress_patterns: sometimes turned to substances, later found healthier coping
crisis_response.crisis_leadership: gave voice to marginalized during crises

influence_style.change_mechanism: humanized the forgotten and inspired redemption

resource_relationship.wealth_perspective: means to support family and causes
resource_relationship.resource_allocation: supported family, gave to causes, lived modestly by star standards
resource_relationship.resource_transparency: honest about money troubles and recovery

time_orientation.legacy_concern: high - wanted to be remembered for truth-telling
time_orientation.present_vs_future_balance: lived intensely while building enduring work
time_orientation.intergenerational_thinking: wanted music to speak to future generations
time_orientation.urgency_vs_patience: urgent about authenticity, patient with redemption

collaboration_enhancement.delegation_approach: trusted June Carter and close team
